page.title: 02Station Rd Surgery W.Wickham
page.content: The surgery is a General Practice and does not specialise in anything. Six partners, a trainee and a part time doctor work there. On the ground floor there are five rooms plus a reception area and a waiting room. On the first floor there are three rooms. Five receptionists, two nursing sis- ters, a secretary, a prescriptionist a book keeper and two cleaning ladies also work at the surgery. Doctors carry a great deal of equip- ment such as a stethoscope, needles, dressings, etc which they buy themsel- ves. In the surgery, scales, peak flow meters, scissors, etc are bought by the partnership. Twelve thousand patients are on the surgery's list. Each partner and trainee do nine surgeries per week The part time assistance does three to five surgeries a week. Hannah Carter, Hawes Down.
